mapper.sql: id, key_name, create_time, update_time, creator, updator, monitor_rate_day, monitor_rate_week, monitor_rate_month, monitor_rate_year, open_task
mapper.insert: insert into sys_key (id, key_name, create_time, update_time, creator, updator, monitor_rate_day, monitor_rate_week, monitor_rate_month, monitor_rate_year, open_task, key_list ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitorRateDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monitorRateWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monitorRateMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monitorRateYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openTask,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keyList,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

insert into sys_key
id,
key_name,
create_time,
update_time,
creator,
updator,
monitor_rate_day,
monitor_rate_week,
monitor_rate_month,

mapper.update:
update sys_key
key_name = #{keyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
monitor_rate_day = #{monitorRateDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
monitor_rate_week = #{monitorRateWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER},
monitor_rate_month = #{monitorRateMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
monitor_rate_year = #{monitorRateYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
open_task = #{openTask,jdbcType=INTEGER},
key_list = #{keyList,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_key set key_name = #{keyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, monitor_rate_day = #{monitorRateDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitor_rate_week = #{monitorRateWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitor_rate_month = #{monitorRateMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitor_rate_year = #{monitorRateYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_task = #{openTask,jdbcType=INTEGER}, key_list = #{keyList,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_key set key_name = #{keyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, monitor_rate_day = #{monitorRateDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitor_rate_week = #{monitorRateWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitor_rate_month = #{monitorRateMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitor_rate_year = #{monitorRateYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_task = #{openTask,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, key_name,(LENGTH(key_list)-LENGTH(REPLACE(key_list,',',''))+1) as key_cnt,monitor_rate_day,open_task,update_time from sys_key limit #{pagenum},#{limit};
select count(*) as count from sys_key ;
select count(*) as cnt,key_con as con from key_search group by key_con ORDER BY cnt desc
select count(*) as cnt,url as con from key_search group by url ORDER BY cnt desc
select count(*) from (select * from key_search GROUP BY key_con)a
select count(*) from (select * from key_search GROUP BY url)a
select url as con , 0 as cnt from key_search where key_con = #{keyCon}
select key_con as con , 0 as cnt from key_search where url = #{url}
